mapper.select: select a.plan_no as planNo, a.ord_sht_no as ordShtNo, a.due_date as dueDate , a.work_prot as workPort, a.plan_date as planDate , b.plan_dtl_no as planDtlNo, b.prd_cd as prdCd , b.prc_cd as prcCd , b.need_cnt as needCnt, b.instr_cnt as instrCnt , b.work_str_date as workStrDate , b.work_plan_time as workPlanTime from pdt_plan a join pdt_plan_dtl b on(a.plan_no = b.plan_no)
